TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BufferedWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public MustInherit Class BufferedWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class BufferedWebEventProvider abstract : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 提供基本功能，以建立需要緩衝的事件提供者。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that require buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果您想要自訂的健康情況事件處理，您可以衍生自類別來建立您自己自訂的緩衝處理提供者。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom buffered provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作健康情況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂提供者會將已設定的事件寫入到本機檔案，必須被授與適當的存取權。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#1)] 下列組態檔摘錄會顯示`healthMonitoring`讓 ASP.NET 可以使用上面定義來處理所有的健康監視事件的自訂提供者的組態區段。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 狀況監控系統是在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來具現化物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己的提供者類型繼承自這個類別時。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own provider type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式中的自訂事件提供者。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#8)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，表示提供者使用的緩衝模式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the buffering mode used by the provider.
The name of the buffering mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含所定義的值`bufferMode`屬性中`providers`項目`healthMonitoring`一節。The property contains the value defined by the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element of the `healthMonitoring` section. 下列組態檔摘錄會示範如何在中定義的緩衝模式的名稱`healthMonitoring`一節。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how the name of the buffer mode should be defined in the `healthMonitoring` section. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 將事件從提供者的緩衝區移至事件記錄檔。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法時，所有的緩衝區中的事件都會立即從緩衝區移至記錄檔，而不論多少時間後過了最後一次寫入或緩衝區中有多少事件。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 上次寫入時間，會重設清除動作的時間。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫方法之後呼叫建構函式。ASP.NET calls the method after calling the constructor. 這個方法呼叫來初始化的組態設定和組態檔中指定的名稱。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#2)]

Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是呼叫 ASP.NET 健康監視開始處理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event. 如果已啟用緩衝處理，經過緩衝處理的事件資訊;否則，它會分派至目前的記錄機制。If buffering is enabled, the event information is buffered; otherwise, it is dispatched to the current logging mechanism. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何實作 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEventFlush(class System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo flushInfo) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEventFlush (flushInfo As WebEventBufferFlushInfo)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會處理已緩衝的訊息。The method processes the messages that have been buffered. 需要排清緩衝區時，ASP.NET 健康監視便會呼叫方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls the method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 在間隔的清除需要取決於參數值的`bufferMode`屬性中`providers`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。The intervals at which flushing is required is determined by the parameter value of the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何實作 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫裝載 Web 應用程式的應用程式定義域終止時的方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 若要執行的工作，可讓應用程式結束依正常程序，例如關閉資源，會呼叫方法。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources.
